MD5Checksum.Description: Computes a MD5 checksum of the working file and stores it in the variable "MD5" and in "Checksum".

SHA1Checksum.Description: Computes a SHA1 checksum of the working file and stores it in the variable "SHA1" and in "Checksum".

SHA256Checksum.Description: Computes a SHA256 checksum of the working file and stores it in the variable "SHA256" and in "Checksum".
